name: Prince of Time: Beyond of the Fate
name_original: Prince of Time: Beyond of the Fate
description:
Prince of Time: Beyond of the Fate - is an exciting 2D adventure game about a young prince Stray, 
who inherited mighty power and skills from his ancestors. When our hero got all this power, 
he finds out that his people(race) Atis are at war with the Deadflesh race. 
Stray is eager to help his people in this war, using his strength. 
Although he is only 16 years old, his father sends him to the Training military camp. 
Stray still doesn't know how to use his skills,but oracles predict he will become wise and powerful Time ruler. 
Before he goes to the Training Camp, his grandfather forged a sword for his heir - Antazar. 
Stray gets this sword and then suddenly, he learns that his village was attacked and all his relatives fled to the port, 
except his father - at this time he is in the castle and Stray goes looking for him. 
Now... we have a long and amazing adventure of the Prince.!
In this game you immediately gets in a new fantasy world and its history. 
You will meet with the key characters and their minions. 
You will visit different locations that reflect the spirit of the game in their own way. 
The game is not limited to one world. At the moment the video presents only one world, where the game and your adventure begins. 
The point of the game is that our hero will travel through time, eradicating evil in all time chains. 
Each time loop will be represented by four levels and one "main" level. 
They will have their own elaborated story with a plot, that will reveal and tell all the secrets of the key characters. 
Forward and only forward time!
